message_history.content: Machine Learning is a subset of artificial intelligence (AI) that involves training algorithms to recognize patterns and make decisions based on data.
There are several other subsets of AI, including Natural Language Processing (NLP), Robotics, Computer Vision, Expert Systems, and Neural Networks.
